root.name: Sports Talk Baseball
root.description: Sports Talk Baseball was quite the innovative console sports game of its time, featuring full MLB rosters, and the first play-by-play announcer in any video game. STB also fully rated every player in several skill categories, as well as including battery-powered memory for season W-L tracking. While several wonky features did make it into the game (the speach lagged terribly behind play, AI baserunning and attempting to throw runners out had lots of quirks, 10-run slaughter rule), STB was an enjoyable foray into the console baseball genre.Trivia: The winning team always had a picture of the game MVP in the post-game scoreboard. It was always the same player for each winning team, no matter if that person played or how they performed.
